text: Charlotte Riley (born 29 December 1981) is an English actress. She is best known for playing Sarah in Easy Virtue. She also played Kate Hansen in the movie Entity. Riley was born in Stockton-on-Tees. She married actor Tom Hardy in 2014. ==References== Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from County Durham
title: Charlotte Riley
